articles.title: Coronavirus Outbreak On First Caribbean Cruise - One Mile at a Time
articles.description: Over 10% of passengers on the first Caribbean cruise in months have caught coronavirus. Oh, and no one was wearing masks. Are you surprised?
articles.content: Wait, you mean to tell me that over 10% of the passengers on the first Caribbean cruise since the pandemic started caught coronavirus? All on a cruise line where no one was wearing a mask? That can’t… [+8652 chars]
